info.title: Thermostat Commands API
info.description: Command channel API via Web Sockets

parameters.name: systemId
parameters.description: The system ID this receiver runs on.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The ID under which to register this receiver.

get.description: Registers a new receiver (a.k.a agent) with the given ID.

200.description: When the upgrade request succeeded and registration for the given ID was successful

401.description: When the request did not provide authentication credentials.

403.description: When the user posting the request has insufficient privileges to register a receiver for the provided systemId/agentId pairs.

parameters.name: systemId
parameters.description: The system ID this receiver runs on.

parameters.name: jvmId
parameters.description: The JVM ID to perform an action on.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The ID under which to register this receiver.

parameters.name: seqId
parameters.description: The sequence ID to use for this conversation. Matching responses will have the same sequence ID as provided via seqId.

get.description: Sends a message to the provided receiver identified via *agentId*

200.description: When the upgrade request succeeded and the message was correctly transmitted to the intended receiver.

401.description: When the request did not provide authentication credentials.

403.description: When the user posting the request has insufficient privileges to perform the given action for the given receiver, system and JVM.

type.description: The message type's integer representation. 2 for ClientRequest.

payload.description: Arbitrary key-value-pairs of type string representing request parameters.

AgentResponse.description: Response message received from the receiver (agent) via the gateway.

type.description: The message type's integer representation. 100 for AgentResponse.

sequence.description: The sequence ID of the initiating request

AgentRequest.description: A relayed client request message sent to the receiver from the gateway on behalf of the client.

type.description: The message type's integer representation. 1 for AgentRequest.

sequence.description: The sequence ID of the initiating request

payload.description: Arbitrary key-value-pairs of type string representing request parameters.
